_comment: English translations for HTML Cheat Code

html.description: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

Hello HTML.title: Hello HTML
Hello HTML.code: Hello world, hello Kizamu!

コメント.title: Comments
コメント.code:
<!-- this is a comment -->

<!--
    Or you can comment out a
    large number of lines.
-->

HTMLリンク.title: HTML Links
HTMLリンク.description: Various link types including email, phone, and SMS

画像タグ.title: Image Tag
画像タグ.description: Image element with lazy loading and alt attributes

テキストフォーマット.title: Text Formatting
テキストフォーマット.description: Various text emphasis and formatting tags
テキストフォーマット.code:
Bold Text This text is important Italic Text This text is emphasized Underline Text 
Pre-formatted Text
Source code Deleted text Highlighted text (HTML5) Inserted text Makes text superscripted Makes text subscripted Makes text smaller Ctrl
Text Block Quote

見出し.title: Headings
見出し.code:
This is Heading 1

This is Heading 2

This is Heading 3

This is Heading 4

This is Heading 5
This is Heading 6

セクション分割.title: Section Divisions
セクション分割.description: Container elements for organizing page content: div, span, p, br, hr
セクション分割.code:
Division or Section
Section of text within content

Paragraph of Text

インラインフレーム.title: Inline Frame
インラインフレーム.code:
<iframe title="New York"
    width="342"
    height="306"
    id="gmap_canvas"
    src="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=2880%20Broadway,%20New%20York&t=&z=13&ie=UTF8&iwloc=&output=embed"
    scrolling="no">
</iframe>

HTML内のJavaScript.title: JavaScript in HTML
HTML内のJavaScript.description: Embedded script tag for JavaScript code

ドキュメント構造.title: Document Structure
ドキュメント構造.description: Semantic page layout elements: header, nav, main, footer

HTML5動画.title: HTML5 Video
HTML5動画.description: Video embedding with controls and fallback message
HTML5動画.code:
<video controls="" width="100%">
    <source src="https://interactive-examples.mdn.mozilla.net/media/cc0-videos/flower.mp4" type="video/mp4">
    Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.
</video>

HTML5音声.title: HTML5 Audio
HTML5音声.description: Audio or audio stream embedding with controls
HTML5音声.code:
<audio controls
    src="https://interactive-examples.mdn.mozilla.net/media/cc0-audio/t-rex-roar.mp3">
    Your browser does not support the audio element.
</audio>

HTML5 Ruby.title: HTML5 Ruby
HTML5 Ruby.description: Ruby annotation for pronunciation guide (e.g., Chinese pronunciation)

テーブルの例.title: Table Example
テーブルの例.description: Basic table with header and body sections

順序なしリスト.title: Unordered List
順序なしリスト.code:
• I'm an item
  • I'm another item
  • I'm another item

順序付きリスト.title: Ordered List
順序付きリスト.code:
1. I'm the first item
  2. I'm the second item
  3. I'm the third item

定義リスト.title: Definition List
定義リスト.code:
<dl>
    <dt>A Term</dt>
    <dd>Definition of a term</dd>
    <dt>Another Term</dt>
    <dd>Definition of another term</dd>
</dl>

フォームタグ.title: Form Tag
フォームタグ.description: Complete form collecting email, password, and checkbox inputs

ラベルタグ.title: Label Tag
ラベルタグ.description: Nested and referenced label patterns for form inputs
ラベルタグ.code:
<!-- Nested label -->
<label>Click me 
<input type="text" id="user" name="name"/>
</label>

<!-- 'for' attribute -->
<label for="user">Click me</label>
<input id="user" type="text" name="name"/>

ラジオボタン.title: Radio Buttons
ラジオボタン.description: Select exactly one option from a group
ラジオボタン.code:
<input type="radio" name="gender" id="m">
<label for="m">Male</label>
<input type="radio" name="gender" id="f">
<label for="f">Female</label>

チェックボックス.title: Checkboxes
チェックボックス.code:
<input type="checkbox" name="s" id="soc">
<label for="soc">Soccer</label>
<input type="checkbox" name="s" id="bas">
<label for="bas">Baseball</label>

Selectタグ.title: Select Tag
Selectタグ.code:
<label for="city">City:</label>
<select name="city" id="city">
    <option value="1">Sydney</option>
    <option value="2">Melbourne</option>
    <option value="3">Cromwell</option>
</select>

Fieldsetタグ.title: Fieldset Tag
Fieldsetタグ.description: Grouped form elements with legend title
Fieldsetタグ.code: Your favorite monster

Datalistタグ.title: Datalist Tag
Datalistタグ.description: HTML5 predefined options for input field with autocomplete
Datalistタグ.code:
<label for="b">Choose a browser: </label>
<input list="list" id="b" name="browser"/>
<datalist id="list">
  <option value="Chrome">
  <option value="Firefox">
  <option value="Internet Explorer">
  <option value="Opera">
  <option value="Safari">
  <option value="Microsoft Edge">
</datalist>

送信とリセットボタン.title: Submit and Reset Buttons
送信とリセットボタン.code:
<form action="register.php" method="post">
  <label for="foo">Name:</label>
  <input type="text" name="name" id="foo">
  <input type="submit" value="Submit">
  <input type="reset" value="Reset">
</form>

メタタグ.title: Meta Tags
メタタグ.description: Basic metadata including charset, title, URL, description, and image
メタタグ.code:
<meta charset="utf-8">
<title>···</title>
<meta property="og:title"  content="···">
<link rel="canonical" href="https://···">
<meta name="description" content="···">
<meta property="og:image" content="https://···">

Open Graph.title: Open Graph
Open Graph.description: Social media metadata for Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, LinkedIn
Open Graph.code:
<meta property="og:type" content="website">
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_CA">
<meta property="og:title" content="HTML cheatsheet">
<meta property="og:url" content="https://Kizamu.com/html">
<meta property="og:image" content="https://xxx.com/image.jpg">
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Name of your website">
<meta property="og:description" content="Description of this page">

Twitter Cards.title: Twitter Cards
Twitter Cards.description: Twitter-specific metadata for shared content cards
Twitter Cards.code:
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary">
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@FechinLi">
<meta name="twitter:title" content="HTML cheatsheet">
<meta name="twitter:url" content="https://Kizamu.com/html">
<meta name="twitter:description" content="Description of this page">
<meta name="twitter:image" content="https://xxx.com/image.jpg">

ジオタギング.title: Geotagging
ジオタギング.code:
<meta name="ICBM" content="45.416667,-75.7">
<meta name="geo.position" content="45.416667;-75.7">
<meta name="geo.region" content="ca-on">
<meta name="geo.placename" content="Ottawa">
